query:
SELECT 
  ph.id as highlight_id,
  ph.title,
  ph.duration,
  ph.audio_url,
  avt.id as video_task_id,
  avt.status as video_status,
  avt.error_message,
  avt.video_url,
  avt.created_at as video_created_at
FROM podcast_highlights ph
LEFT JOIN avatar_video_tasks avt ON ph.id = avt.highlight_id
WHERE ph.created_at >= '2025-01-25 10:30:00'
ORDER BY ph.created_at DESC
LIMIT 5;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user LtHxqrZriiUHME1.0a62a726ab17 --database kf362K9uEYqJammqLrrUaT --execute SELECT 
  ph.id as highlight_id,
  ph.title,
  ph.duration,
  ph.audio_url,
  avt.id as video_task_id,
  avt.status as video_status,
  avt.error_message,
  avt.video_url,
  avt.created_at as video_created_at
FROM podcast_highlights ph
LEFT JOIN avatar_video_tasks avt ON ph.id = avt.highlight_id
WHERE ph.created_at >= '2025-01-25 10:30:00'
ORDER BY ph.created_at DESC
LIMIT 5;
